results.content: Ember version is very out of date. Inconsistent mic quality and slow monotone delivery of content. feels like first draft and lacks editing to prevent wasting time, such as leaving syntax errors and spending time correcting them. does not clearly explain what he is doing and why. Official Ember docs are more concise and informative.
